CustomFieldTranslation.name: Affl_ProgEnroll_Del_Status__c
CustomFieldTranslation.help: If the related setting, Affil Delete When Delete Prog Enrol, is disabled, this setting specifies the value to set for the Affiliation's Status, when its related Program Enrolment is deleted.
CustomFieldTranslation.label: Affil Status When Delete Prog Enrol
